scripts.electron:dev: concurrently "npx cross-env BROWSER=none npm run start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p src/main -w" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p src/main && electron --enable-logging ."
scripts.electron:build-mac-unnotarized: npm run compile && NOTARIZATION=none electron-builder build --mac --publish always
scripts.electron:build-win: npm run compile && electron-builder build --win --publish always
scripts.electron:build-linux: npm run compile && electron-builder build --linux --publish always
scripts.electron:build-mac: npm run compile && electron-builder build --mac --publish always
scripts.upload:win:
BUCKET=devbook-publish && gsutil cp gs://$BUCKET/latest.yml gs://$BUCKET/archive/$(date +%Y-%M-%d-%H%M)-latest.yml && echo Devbook-*.exe latest.yml | tr ' ' '
' | xargs -n 1 -I{} gsutil -h "Cache-Control:no-cache, max-age=0" cp dist/{} gs://$BUCKET
scripts.upload:mac:
BUCKET=devbook-publish && echo Devbook-*.dmg Devbook-*.zip latest-mac.yml | tr ' ' '
' | xargs -n 1 -I{} gsutil -h "Cache-Control:no-cache, max-age=0" cp dist/{} gs://$BUCKET
scripts.upload:linux:
BUCKET=devbook-publish && gsutil cp gs://$BUCKET/latest-linux.yml gs://$BUCKET/archive/$(date +%Y-%M-%d-%H%M)-latest-linux.yml && echo Devbook-*.AppImage latest-linux.yml | tr ' ' '
' | xargs -n 1 -I{} gsutil -h "Cache-Control:no-cache, max-age=0" cp dist/{} gs://$BUCKET
scripts.release:win: npx rimraf dist && npm run electron:build-win && npm run upload:win
scripts.release:mac: npx rimraf dist && npm run electron:build-mac && npm run upload:mac
scripts.release:linux: npx rimraf dist && npm run electron:build-linux && npm run upload:linux
